problems.title: Create a Min Heap and Insert Elements
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given N integers. Create a Min Heap and insert all values one by one.
After all insertions, print the heap array.

Min Heap: Parent node is always less than or equal to its children.

Input Format
The first line contains integer N.
The second line contains N space-separated integers.

Output Format
Print the heap array as space-separated values.
If the heap is empty, print "Heap is Empty".

Example
Input:
5
30 20 40 10 25

Output:
10 20 40 30 25

Explanation:
After inserting all elements, the min heap array is [10, 20, 40, 30, 25].
problems.examples:
Sample Input 1
5
30 20 40 10 25

Sample Output 1
10 20 40 30 25

Sample Input 2
3
10 20 30

Sample Output 2
10 20 30
